page.title: 15HEALTH
page.content: The{four doctors}including a trainee are based in Aberfeldy, serving an area about 720sq km. They have{3430}patients on their list. The nine parttime staff incl.clerical, a{Psychologist, Orthodontist}and a {Chiropodist.}There is also a{social {worker}. On Monday till Friday the surgery is open from{eight thirty}till{six {o'clock}at night,and on{Saturday}it is open from{eight thirty}till{eleven {thirty}in the morning. The doctors carry{instruments}in their cases in case of{emergencies.}They do not attend their own family because personal attachment would cause tension and worry. {Dr.Pitchforth}specializes in childrens medicine{.Dr McBride}in{Orthopaedic & {Anaesthetic}and{Dr Wright}specialize in{Cardiac medicine.
